column4: i have a driver disk with linux drivers on it, but i have to compile them and am getting an error
please anyone? help with a wireless usb network adaptor here!
wasn't sure if I was on this properly or not
um yeah pretty new to it
I really need help getting this wireless usb adaptor installed
I have source code for the driver but can't compile it
I get errors like this: error: ‘struct net_device’ has no member named ‘open’
i just typed sudo init in the terminal window and it came back with init: missing runlevel
Why are you trying to change the runlevel?
Why did you change your runlevel?
Do you have any internet access on that computer?
Can you pastebin the exact errors you are getting, along with the commands that you're running?

Good news and bad news:  Bad: Looks like lots of people have issues compiling this module from source. Good: It should be included in a new kernel release. Bad: Not the one thats shipping with Lucid. Good: you can probably use ndiswrapper instead Bad: You might have issuses connecting to some secure networks.
